title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Mathematics Learning Design for Integrated Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts, awareness of Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles, and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more mathematical concept visualization materials utilizing AR technology.
Learners can design math lessons considering disability types and learning levels by applying UDL (Universal Design for Learning) principles.
Learners can develop two or more AR-based formative assessment tools for large-scale online learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
